titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University, W. W. Hansen Laboratories of Physics, Records
Stanford University, W. W. Hansen Laboratories of Physics, Records
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Stanford University. W.W. Hansen Laboratory of Physics.

did.unittitle: Stanford University, W. W. Hansen Laboratories of Physics, records

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

custodhist.p: Transferred by the W. W. Hansen Laboratories, 1969

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections and Univeristy Archives.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University. W. W. Hansen Laboratories of Physics Records, SC 062, Stanford University Archives, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contracts, proposals, correspondence, and memoranda from the files of the William W. Hansen Laboratories relating to the construction of the Stanford Linear Accelerator, the development of the Klystron tube, and medical research using linear accelerators.
